thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 16 of 282
thread.title: Georgena

author: Georgena
title: Georgena
text:
We really like using hello Fresh. It's easy, fast and good.
I am really saving money not going to the grocery store all the time. I know what I am cooking that night and I have choices.
I have noticed that sometimes the recipe card instructions are not clear.
I would like to see a defference in the preparation of the entree, they all seem to be similar.
I have recommended Hello Fresh to several friends of mine. I haven't yet how they like it (they just started).
